Good Comments: Great translations! They have 2 subtitle tracks too, one with OCG terms and other with TCG terms, to accommodate both Japanese and US terms. Though they really should release the OCG terms as the default track, saving us from having to switch every time.
Good translation, fairly high translation speed and great subbitle design&effects.
The quickest, easily accessible and segmentised so i can skil op/ed if I don't want to see them

They're moderately fast, timing's great, and they put a lot of effort into the details whenever there's a big summon :P

Some little mistakes here and there, but that's over multiple episodes did I catch a couple typos
Quick and accurate subs with interesting effects.
Bad Comments: Mono is a based dude and he did pretty well. Too bad he quit tho, his subs were the best subs. Also dat rainbow effect when Pendulum is happening is fabulous.
Different tracks for TCG and OCG card names, card names are coloured to match the card type.
Nice and neat translations. Though I hate how they still kept the TCG name "Monster Reborn" instead of the OCG name "Resurrection of the Dead" for OCG subs.
I take my old statement back. I did not realize that there were two subtitle tracks.
Fast, and good knowledge of Japanese Grammar.
